author: Source: Channel3000
title: 'Pan' star, writer thrilled to give new 'hook' to iconic character - Channel3000
text:
When the characters where drawn out for the hotly anticipated "Peter Pan" film prequel "Pan," filmmakers Joe Wright and Jason Fuchs, along with star Garrett Hedlund were pretty intent on giving the J.M. Barrie story's iconic characters a different spin. Since it's not often such a time-honored tale gets a fully fleshed-out back story, Fuchs decided to give one core character, Captain Hook, a new, well, hook; and Hedlund was thrilled to be a part of it.
 Channel3000.
